attributes.action: Abolish the section 30 public order law , or in affect create a claus which states that sufficient evidence of anti social behaviour must be provided in order to produce a section 30 as an ASBO.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and a small group of friends were sat in the local gardens singing and having a good time in no way acting anti socially when a female police officer gave us all section 30's meaning we were unable to return to that area for 24 hours , i accept that in cases it is a good way of reducing anti social behaviour but however in this case myself and my peers were not behaving in any such way. Therefore i would like there to be a claus in the section 30 which states that there has to be a legitimate reason for producing a section 30 order.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
